bug.author: Jupiter79
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
I called streamlit.beta_page_config once at the beginning of the code, It works at start, but, when using slider in app, it reports the error: StreamlitAPIException: beta_set_page_config() can only be called once per app, and must be called as the first Streamlit command in your script. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug:
Go to 'https://nimani.diplomacy.edu:8502/' Click on 'Isolation Forest ' radio button from sidebar menu try to change slider 'Contamination' on sidebar menu
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
It should show updated plotly table <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
It reports error: `StreamlitAPIException: beta_set_page_config() can only be called once per app, and must be called as the first Streamlit command in your script. <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
That is, did this use to work the way you expected in the past? no, feature did not exist in earlier versions, since it is a new beta feature <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.65.1 Python version: 3.7.7 Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? No OS version: Ubuntu 18.04 Browser version: Google Chrome, Version 84.0.4147.125
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
If needed, add any other context about the problem here. For example, did this bug come from <denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlit.io>https://discuss.streamlit.io</denchmark-link> or another site? Link the original source here!

comments.comment: I am also receiving the same error but sporadically. Refreshing the page is helping sometimes but I am getting this error even when running the program for the first time.
